### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] disk failure on stor-b-19: disk rebuild completed in 6.2 hours

- [INFO] rebalance jobs: started 7, completed 8, queue depth 3
- [INFO] quota alert thresholds updated to 90/95%, weekly top 10 tenants report added

### Deployments & Changes
- Replaced failing disk on stor-b-19; rebuild completed; no under-replicated objects remain
- Restarted two storage nodes after NIC driver parameter change; validated link stability
- Rebalance completed more jobs than started; queue cleared to depth 3; hottest-node utilization decreased by ~0.6%
- Updated quota alert thresholds to warn at 90/95%; added weekly report for top 10 tenants

### Events
- Replaced failing disk on stor-b-19 and completed rebuild in 6.2 hours; confirmed no under-replicated objects remain
- Two storage nodes restarted after planned NIC driver parameter change; validated stable link and reduced network drops thereafter
- Rebalance completed more jobs than started, clearing queue to depth 3; hottest-node utilization fell by ~0.6%
- Updated quota alert thresholds to warn at 90/95% and added weekly report for top 10 fastest-growing tenants

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Jae M. 3 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Stable; minor maintenance executed successfully, capacity trend steady upward with improved rebalance effectiveness
